name: Pizza Pandemonium
description:
Pizza Pandemonium was built in 48 hours by a solo developer. Existing models, sound effects, and music were used, but all animations, effects, and code were written from scratch in one weekend.

Assets:

  • Spaceship model - https://niko-3d-models.itch.io/free-sc-fi-spaceships-pack
  • Food models - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/free-casual-food-pack-mobile...
  • Skybox - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-10...
  • Sound effects & music - https://zapsplat.com/
